model_details.description:
This model is the baseline model described in [Semi-supervised sequence tagging with bidirectional language models](https://api.semanticscholar.org/CorpusID:7197241).
                        It uses a Gated Recurrent Unit (GRU) character encoder as well as a GRU phrase encoder,
                        and it starts with pretrained GloVe vectors for its token embeddings. It was trained on
                        the CoNLL-2003 NER dataset.
model_details.short_description: NER tagger using a Gated Recurrent Unit (GRU) character encoder as well as a GRU phrase encoder, with GloVe embeddings.
